Creatures.Creatures.Creatures.2fp8gprz.Name: Zombie - Bloater
Languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

Traits.Name: Bloat Burst
Traits.Content: After 1d4 - 0 turns, the bloated zombie's body bursts in a 15ft. radius causing 1d6 poison damage and requiring all targets to make a DEX 13 Save or take the poisoned effect.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Traits.Name: Swarm
Traits.Content: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny Limb. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Traits.Name: Unusual Nature
Traits.Content: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The swarm makes one Undead Mass attack and one Grasping Limbs attack.

Actions.Name: Undead Mass
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 0ft., one target in the swarm's space. _Hit_: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

Actions.Name: Grasping Limbs
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 0ft., one creature in the swarm's space. _Hit:_ 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Strength Saving Throw or be restrained. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking 7 (2d6) necrotic damage on a failed save. The creature is freed if it succeeds on this saving throw, the swarm moves out of the creature's space, or the swarm dies.

Creatures.Creatures.Creatures.p9f6agt1.Name: Zombie - Contagious
Languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

Traits.Name: Undead Fortitude
Traits.Content: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage. Target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution Saving Throw or become infected with Brain Rot

Traits.Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
Traits.Content: Aluka has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Traits.Name: Bonus Proficiencies
Traits.Content: Aluka is proficient with Leather Armor and Simple Weapons

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Aluka makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Actions.Name: Spear
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 10 (20/60) ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Shortbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

BonusActions.Name: Helpful
BonusActions.Content: Aluka is adept at giving well-timed assistance and can take the Help action as a bonus action

BonusActions.Name: Cunning Action
BonusActions.Content: Aluka's agility allows her to act speedily. On her turn in combat, she can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide actions as a bonus action.

Actions.Name: Shortsword
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5ft. one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage

StatBlock.Name: Sildar Hallwinter

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Sildar makes two melee attacks

Actions.Name: Longsword
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +3 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. _Hit_: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Heavy Crossbow
Actions.Content: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, range 100 ft./400 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

Reactions.Name: Parry
Reactions.Content: When an attacker hits Sildar with a melee attack and Sildar can see the attacker, he can roll 1d6 and add the number rolled to his AC against the triggering attack, provided that he’s wielding a melee weapon.

StatBlock.Description: Sildar Hallwinter is a retired soldier and sellsword who hails from the city of Neverwinter. He is a loyal member of the Lords’ Alliance, a political organization that unites the various free cities and towns of the North.

Actions.Name: Shortbow

LegendaryActions.Name: Action Surge

Actions.Name: Hand Crossbow

LegendaryActions.Name: Cunning Action
LegendaryActions.Content: On each of its turns, the investigator can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide Action

Actions.Name: Lance

Special: You have disadvantage when you use a lance to Attack a target within 5 feet of you. Also, a lance requires two hands to wield when you aren't mounted.

LegendaryActions.Content: The sidekick is adept at giving well-timed assistance; the sidekick can take the Help action as a bonus action.

LegendaryActions.Name: Cunning Action
LegendaryActions.Content: The sidekick's agility or quick thinking allows it to act speedily. On its turn in combat, it can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide Action as a Bonus Action

Actions.Name: Longsword
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. _Hit:_ 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

PersistentCharacters.xkxpz3hz.Name: Strixis Black (Gladdhead - Cult Leader)
PersistentCharacters.xkxpz3hz.SearchHint: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

StatBlock.Name: Strixis Black (Gladdhead - Cult Leader)
StatBlock.Type: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

Traits.Name: Dark Devotion
Traits.Content: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content:
The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared: 

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: [Light] (Cantrip)
Actions.Content:
[You touch one object](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/light) that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

Actions.Name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip)
Actions.Content: [Flame-like radiance descends](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/sacred-flame) on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

Actions.Name: Thaumaturgy (Cantrip)
Actions.Content:
[You manifest a minor wonder](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/thaumaturgy), a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range:

- Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.
- You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.
- You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.
- You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.
- You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.
- You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

Actions.Name: Command (1st Level)
Actions.Content:
[You speak a one-word command](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/command) to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn't understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it.

Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the GM determines how the target behaves. If the target can't follow your command, the spell ends.

**Approach.** The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

**Drop.** The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

**Flee.** The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

**Grovel.** The target falls prone and then ends its turn.

**Halt.** The target doesn't move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

Actions.Name: Inflict Wounds (1st Level)
Actions.Content: [Make a melee spell attack](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/inflict-wounds) against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

Actions.Name: Shield of Faith (1st Level - C)
Actions.Content: [A shimmering field](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/shield-of-faith) appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

Actions.Name: Hold Person (2nd Level - C)
Actions.Content: [Choose a humanoid](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/hold-person) that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

Actions.Name: Spiritual Weapon (2nd Level)
Actions.Content:
[You create a floating](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/spiritual-weapon), spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell's effect resemble that weapon.

Traits.Name: Cavalry Charge
Traits.Content: If the dragonborn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature while mounted and then hits with a lance attack on the same turn, it can make a trample attack against that creature as a bonus action.

Actions.Name: Lance
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Heavy Crossbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Trample (Mounted Only)
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Traits.Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
Traits.Content: Sora has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell

Traits.Name: Pack Tactics
Traits.Content: Sora has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Traits.Name: Bonus Proficiencies
Traits.Content: Sora is proficient with all Armor

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content:
_Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
_Hit:_ 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength Saving Throw or be knocked prone.

BonusActions.Name: Second Wind (Warrior Sidekick Lvl 2)
BonusActions.Content: As a bonus action, regain hit points equal to 1d10 + Sora's Level in this class. Once this feature is used, Sora must complete a short or long rest before it can be used again.

Reactions.Name: Defender (Warrior Sidekick Lvl 1)
Reactions.Content: Sora can use her reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn't Sora, provided Sora can see the attacker
